attributes.action: Vehicle tax prices Not to rise after April 1st 2017
attributes.additional_details:
Just another way for the government to take more of your hard earn pay check and they think you wouldn't notice 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-vehicle-tax-rates-from-1-april-2017
attributes.background: After April vehicle tax will rise from a minimum off £0 which is good but then the maximum you could pay is £2000 road tax was abolished in 1937 and replaced by Vehicle Excise Duty. This is a tax on cars, not roads, and it goes straight into the general Treasury fund
